CDC: 12,000 people warned about meningitis symptoms

Those cautioned are among about 14,000 people who may have received contaminated steroid shots from a Framingham pharmacy. (AP, 1:05 p.m.)

Reward offered in search for Mass. teen

The $10,000 reward is being offered in the search for Elizabeth “Lizzi” Marriott, 19, of Westborough. She was last heard from on Tuesday when she sent a text saying was driving to a friend’s house in Dover, N.H. (Globe, 12:05 p.m.)

Iraq to buy Czech military planes for $1 billion

Iraq has agreed to buy 28 Czech-made planes, part of a broader effort by Baghdad to rebuild military capabilities destroyed during the US-led invasion of the country, officials said.
